meanings.definition: Occurring or done after the harvesting of crops.
meanings.sent1: The farmer stored the corn in the postharvest period.
meanings.sent2: The postharvest vegetables were ready for sale at the market.
meanings.sent3: After the postharvest celebration, the fields were empty.
meanings.sent4: The postharvest tranquility settled over the farm.
meanings.sent5: The postharvest silence was broken only by the rustling of leaves.

meanings.definition: The period of time following the harvesting of crops.
meanings.sent1: During the postharvest, the crops are prepared for distribution.
meanings.sent2: Farmers work diligently in the postharvest to ensure crop quality.
meanings.sent3: The postharvest seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent4: In the postharvest, the fields transformed into a busy hub.
meanings.sent5: The postharvest buzzed with activity as trucks came and went.
